puzzle1.name: puzzle1
puzzle1.description:
This is kind of like the SAW movies, You must figure out how to unlock the door.
There are twelve pictures and boom box that appears to have 3 CDs inside. Good luck!

SKYLINE.name: SKYLINE
SKYLINE.description: Skyline is a song by FKJ, that will send you chill vibes.

SOAR.name: SOAR
SOAR.description: Soar is a song by Christina Aguilera that will motivate you to do great things.

WALK IT TALK IT.name: WALK IT TALK IT
WALK IT TALK IT.description: Walk It, Talk It is a song by Migos, that will help you walk the path you have spoken.

EIFFEL TOWER.name: Eiffel Tower
EIFFEL TOWER.description: A picture of the Eiffel Tower.

SOARING EAGLE.name: SOARING EAGLE
SOARING EAGLE.description: This is a picture of an eagle soaring in the sky with a golden microphone in it's talons.

SUNSET.name: SUNSET
SUNSET.description: A picture of a beautiful sunset on a beach.

SUNSET LAKE.name: SUNSET LAKE
SUNSET LAKE.description: A picture of a sun setting in the lake.

SKYLINE PICTURE.name: SKYLINE PICTURE
SKYLINE PICTURE.description: This is a picture of the beautiful Seattle skyline.

WALKING PICTURE.name: WALKING PICTURE
WALKING PICTURE.description: This is a picture of a group of friends walking down a path.

hints: You might want to look at the song titles to guide the pictures you take clues from. The Order of key entry will be based on the left to right order of the songs
